data.title: Raúl García (boxer)
data.meta_description: Raúl "Rayito" García Hirales is a Mexican former professional boxer. He has held the IBF mini flyweight title from June 2008 until March 2010 and WBO mini flyweight title from April 2011 until October 2011. He is the twin brother of former WBO light flyweight champion Ramón García Hirales.
